import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "./style.css"; export default function SignUp() { const history = useNavigate(); const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName:"", lastName:'', email:"", password:"", age:"", }) const userChangeHandler = (event) => { const name = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; const tempUser = {...user}; tempUser[name] = value; setUser(tempUser) } const signUpSubmitHandler = () => { axios.post("http://localhost:8080/save", user).then((response) => { localStorage.setItem("loggedInUser", response.data.tempUser) history.push("/thank-you"); }).catch((error) => { console.log("User object not placed" + console) }) } const SignUpForm = ({ history, onSubmit, onChange, errors, user, score, btnTxt, type, pwMask, onPwChange }) => { return (

Sign up below!!!

) } }
